trigger: Parking orbit apogee < 90 nm or perigee < 80 nm
immediate_effect: CSM state vector unsafe for TLI
TLI burn starts without updated PAD
recovery_actions: Execute MCC-1 earlier; uplink revised PAD

trigger: Δv shortfall > 10 m/s at TLI shutdown
recovery_actions: Plan corrective burn at next communications window

trigger: LM hard dock not confirmed by GET 003:45:00
ongoing_penalty: RCS prop usage +10 lb/hr while redocking
recovery_actions: Recycle docking sequence; verify capture latches

immediate_effect: Cryo boiloff trending +0.5 lb/hr per tank
recovery_actions: Engage PTC and shed non-critical loads

trigger: PTC roll rate deviates for >30 min
MCC-1 PAD not verified before burn window
recovery_actions: Request updated PAD at next comm window

trigger: MCC-1 burn not executed by GET 010:10
State vector not updated after MCC-1
Consumables check not logged by GET 013:00
recovery_actions: Repeat log and verify LiOH status

trigger: P52 realignment not completed by GET 016:45:00
recovery_actions: Execute P52 realignment and request ground vector

trigger: Program 23 optics update not completed by GET 018:30:00
recovery_actions: Perform P23 sightings and uplink corrections

trigger: MCC-2 PAD not verified before evaluation window
recovery_actions: Request PAD reread and delay evaluation

trigger: MCC-2 go/no-go not recorded by GET 025:30:00
MCC-2 required but not executed or Δv shortfall >1 ft/s
